summary: Completed mobile responsiveness testing for Arabic transfers app. Tested header display at 400px width, login functionality, admin access, and forgot password flow.

minor_bugs.issue: Protected route test returning unknown error instead of proper 401

ui_bugs.issue: Error messages for incorrect credentials not displaying with data-testid

integration_issues.issue: Chat and delivery buttons not visible on mobile (400px width)
History and profile tabs not found during mobile testing

passed_tests: Landing page header displays correctly on mobile (400px)
Logo and brand name visible on mobile
Login and signup buttons visible on mobile
Navigation from landing page to login works
Login page displays correctly on mobile
Admin login with correct credentials successful
Redirect to rider dashboard after login works
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix login error message display and improve mobile visibility of chat/delivery buttons. Consider responsive design improvements for dashboard navigation elements.
